activities: Grace receives personal data for business purposes, such as i) matters relating to day-to-day business operations, job functions, compensation, employee benefits, performance assessments, and training, ii) offering services and benefits to employees, iii) maintaining contact with current and former employees, and iv) compliance with our legal obligations.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
